attributes.title: TERRIBLE 😠😠😠😡🤬😡😡😠
attributes.review: Donald trump himself leaped out of my phone and defecated on my brand new eco friendly bamboo flooring, afterwards he threatened to hate crime me and ran out My door stomping on the raspberry bushes I painstakingly grew for homemade jam. One star, I would give it ZERO if I could.

attributes.title: Starting to feel sick
attributes.review: Either it’s the blue light given from the app, or something worse, I downloaded this to support my president, but I was repulsed upon opening it.

attributes.title: Don’t Download
attributes.review: I honestly just don’t like the app what so ever it’s horrible and there is nothing good about it what so ever I don’t know why I downloaded it in the first place I don’t even like trump (tik tok for life)

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: This app is horrible. Loading speeds are VERY bad, it’s VERY unorganized, and etc. I can rant about this app for days. Not even my friends that support Trump like the app. Absolutely disgusting what you’ve done.

attributes.title: Terrible and terrifying
attributes.review: It’s a HORRIBLE thing to see,the quality,oí HORRIBLE, DISGUSTING, and TERRIBLE. I don’t recommend that Trump thing even that name disgusts me I must say. He’s a rapist I mean how could you see good in him? But anyways I was saying it’s just a terrible app.

attributes.title: ew
attributes.review: terrible app took so long to download. pointless and is just trying to get money from you. this app took so much space on my phone and all they want is your vote and money. DO NOT GET THIS APP.

attributes.title: THIS APP IS SO BAD
attributes.review: I have never supported trump but then I found out what all he has been doing since COVID-19. I got this app as a joke and ngl it was really laggy and took FOREVER to download. Overall I would give this app 1 star.

attributes.title: 0/10 would not recommend
attributes.review: if I could give this app less than one star I could, i lost the will to live every time i laid eyes on this app

attributes.title: EW
attributes.review: This app literally made me throw up the first time I opened it. Disgusting. Who allowed this to be released to the public? God the stupidity in it is contagious🤒 Worse than the coronavirus if you ask me. Absolutely awful.

attributes.title: SCAM
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to get more information about Trump to be able to support his campaign but instead this app is filled with racism and homophobia. Doesn’t actually support and is not associated with Trump.
